Build a shelter using natural materials such as leaves, branches, and vines to protect yourself from the elements.
Create a fishing trap using rocks and string or rope to catch fish for food.
Collect rainwater in a container, such as a coconut shell, to drink and cook with.
Start a fire using dry wood and flint or steel to keep warm and signal for help.
Use your knowledge of plants and their properties to identify edible fruits and vegetables, medicinal herbs, and other useful resources.
